title: WebXR
short: An online interactive 3D scene, compatible with virtual reality!
description: WebXR is more of a test project with XR (VR/AR) development on web browsers than a real game.
It's a 3D scene with a few objects, and support for hand tracking with gestudes to select objects, teleport in the scene and move props around.
It's compatible (adn tester) with VR headsets, such as the Oculus Quest.
If this project interests you, you can find the source code on my GitHub page ! An hosted version will be available soon.
